One person involved in the case on the Tiffany side told me at the time that 95 percent of everything on eBay that was supposedly made by Tiffany was, in fact, fraudulent.) I hope they don’t party too hard at eBay not only because Tiffany is sure to appeal but also because it has lost three similar cases in Europe, brought by Rolex, Hermes and Louis Vuitton.
